title: Demacian Icon

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: For The Icon, I've waited for about 4-3 days and I was wondering if either it will be given at March, 27, 2017 or if there is a "bug" and it does not send the icons to the players who requested them. My friend also has this issue.

replies.body:
No worries! Demacia icons will be going out in regular intervals since our system would be overloaded if we tried to give it to everyone all at once. All of the icons should be sent out by April 20th.

If you don't see yours by April 27th, hit us up in a ticket and we'll be able to look into that icon for you!

Thank you very much Broporo! Keep doing what you do.
{{summoner:31}}
